event.title: 2009 advanced placement testing, and the student body is encouraged

data.event: Huntsville High School students have until Tuesday to register for 2009 advanced placement testing, and the student body is encouraged to take advantage of the testing opportunity.
“The annual CollegeBoard AP tests will be administered from May 4-8 and May 11-15, and the deadline for students to register for these exams is this Tuesday,” Surley said.
“The annual CollegeBoard AP tests will be administered from May 4-8 and May 11-15, and the deadline for students to register for these exams is this Tuesday,” Surley said.

event.title: said the exam schedule is the same for every high school in the country, and the days

data.event: Surley said the exam schedule is the same for every high school in the country, and the days students take their specific tests depend on that schedule.
“Students cannot change the days they take tests on, but most of the time, they don’t overlap on tests,” she said.
